idlastro/

sxdelpar.pro


top source sxdelpar

sxdelpar, h, parname

NAME: SXDELPAR PURPOSE: Procedure to delete a keyword parameter(s) from a FITS header

CALLING SEQUENCE: sxdelpar, h, parname

INPUTS: h - FITS or STSDAS header, string array parname - string or string array of keyword name(s) to delete

OUTPUTS: h - updated FITS header, If all lines are deleted from the header, then h is returned with a value of 0

EXAMPLE: Delete the astrometry keywords CDn_n from a FITS header, h

IDL> sxdelpar, h, ['CD1_1','CD1_2','CD2_1','CD2_2']

NOTES: (1) No message is returned if the keyword to be deleted is not found (2) All appearances of a keyword in the header will be deleted HISTORY: version 1 D. Lindler Feb. 1987 Test for case where all keywords are deleted W. Landsman Aug 1995 Allow for headers with more than 32767 lines W. Landsman Jan. 2003 Use ARRAY_EQUAL, cleaner syntax W. L. July 2009

Parameters

h
parname
